eewa kotharam nirarthakada kiyath ohu danneya.+ 12 yehowa dewiyani, oben hikmawim labana thanaththa santhoshawathya.+obe nithiya gana oba uganwana thanaththa santhoshawathya.+ 13 oba dushtayanwa ada damimata walak harana thek,+paminena wipaththiwalata sansunwa muhuna dimata ohuta haki wana pinisa oba ese karannehiya.+ 14 yehowa dewi ohuge senangawa ath noharinneya.+thama urumaya wu owunwa iwatha nodamanneya.+ 15 dharmishta lesa thindu dena kalayak nawatha paminenneya.+awanka sith athi siyallo eewa piligannoya. 16 ma wenuwen aparadhakaruwanta wiruddhawa nangi sitinne kawuda?+napuru kriya karannanta wiruddha wimata mage paththe sitinne kawuda?+ 17 yehowa dewi mata upakara nokale nam+me wana witath ma sadahatama nihanda wi hamaraya.+ 18 “mage paya lissanna aasannayi” kiya ma sithuwath+yehowa dewiyani, obe imahath premaya* nisa oba mata watenna ida nodunnehiya.+ 19 mage sitha nosansun wu wita+obe imahath premaya mata sanasimak wiya.+ 20 dushta aramunak athuwa nithi panawana+dushitha palakayanta oba samanga mithrathwayak athi karagatha hakida?+ 21 owuhu dharmishtayata darunu lesa pahara dennoya.+nirdosha thanaththekuge le wagirawime aramuna athuwa ohuwa dushtayeku lesa thindu karannoya.+ 22 namuth mage dewi wu yehowa mata us balakotuwak meni.+aarakshawa salasa dena parwathayak meni.+ 23 owun kala napuru dewal dewi aapasu owun pitatama pamunuwanneya.+owun an ayata gena wipaththi owuntama addakinna salaswa dewi owunwa nihanda karanneya.+eseya, ape dewi yehowa owunwa nihanda karanneya.+ githawaliya 94
